extendedInfo.description: Alchemy~Genetics. ATTENTION: HIGHLY ADDICTIVE!Game for people who have a sense of humor! Addictive like Alchemy, amazing like Genetics! Lots of fun, and many hours of gameplay.Combine different animals to create new species. Start with 4 and go up to 500, from obvious to unlikely to bizarre combinations. Play, enjoy and remember: this game was made for laughs! No animals were hurt :)Learn more about amazing animals by clicking the Wikipedia logo on the animal info page!Join the game community on Facebook and share combos with other players all over the world!---PREMIUM version is also available:- No ads- Less permissions- Option to "lock" animals in TVsUpgrade now: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.creativem.geneticsadfree---In this game your elements are animals and "genes", and new breeds are created by adding a trait of one creature to another, for example:Ant + Rat [Tailed] = Scorpion (an arthropod with a tail)Anchovy + Chicken [Domestic] = Golden Carp (a domestic fish)Golden Carp + Scorpion = ???---NB! If you find a bug or something doesn't work for you, PLEASE get in touch with us via e-mail or Facebook! We'll do our best to fix it for you.

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: It is a very good game depending on how good you are or how good you become. Anway I love the game. \302\260_\302\260
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its so awesome
reviews.comment: I love this game, i just finished today and i really hope they add more animals or continue the series. I like how they include the wiki link to learm more about each animal and the hints are pretty good. All in all, a great addicting game, i can honestly say its more addicting than Temple Run. ROCKIN JOB YOU GUYS!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: If more than two icons are anywhere near each other it gets confused. Combinations do not make sense!
reviews.author: James Brohard

reviews.title: Superbly fun
reviews.comment: This game is very addictive, challenges you to think outside the box, a great game to share with a friend while in a waiting room and it can induce chuckles. I upgraded to the premium so I can avoid ads and it gave me a larger work area :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Issue
reviews.comment: I would of given 5 stars if your challenges were correct. The scorpion + beaver + ant (doesn\'t) = spider.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool, Great, Awesome, Wonderful
reviews.author: Malou Dacara

reviews.comment: Can\'t move the icons on screen. They keep getting mixed up as you move them. The combinations are stupid... Uninstalling...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Help w/ Anioto: I started over and am stuck on. This last one any help please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This is such a cool app I love making new animals my bro has it as well so we tell each other combos
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I played it for about 4 days and completed everything. Updates.....? Please.  More of a challenge would be nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lacks depth
reviews.comment: No descriptions of what you just made, just pictures. Boring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s fun but could be better
reviews.comment: It would be easier if there was a separate tap or some way how to tell what an animal is ( Elephant[gigantic] )
reviews.author: Anna Mclean

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Simple at first but gets harder as you make more animals. Addicting!
reviews.author: Denyse Wallace

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Great time killer. Very addictive and keeps you guessing. Apparently certain people around here have no sense of humor.  Can you guys add a log in system that way we have our animals when we get new phones?
reviews.author: Tiffany Gibbs

reviews.title: Very good...
reviews.comment: Luv da game... but I ben waitinfo more animals wat up wit da update???
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: One feature that would be nice is being able to leave an animal in a box while only adding one more.
reviews.author: Krystofer Milton

reviews.comment: Game force closes after menu screen. Unable to play on Samsung Moment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dissapoints
reviews.comment: This game was fun for a while but then it would randomly force close in the middle of playing. I\'ve reported it several times. Still no fix. Once you close the game and go back in later to play it does not save your progress and you are back to the beginning of when you started playing last time.
reviews.author: Melanie Potter

reviews.title: Deleting
reviews.comment: It kept saying I have a bird but I didn\'t.  Decided maybe some update didn\'t work so I reset my progress.  It deleted all the creatures and I can\'t even start now.  When I click help it says congratulations on unlocking all the animals...
reviews.author: Robert Greene

reviews.comment: I\'m really frustrated on spider for level 1 challenge. Help please?!?
reviews.author: A Google User
